```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
clean_data <- read_csv("birthdates.csv") %>%
  mutate(bday = parse_date(str_sub(value, 2, 11))) %>% 
  mutate(months = factor(months(bday), levels=month.name)) %>% 
  group_by(months) %>% 
  summarize(total=n())

clean_data
```
